title: Start implementing landscape support
message:
Start implementing landscape support

Added landscape layout for LoginActivity. Replaced Fragment
constructors calls with newInstance pattern. Fragments now have
setRetainInstance set to true. Current fragment is now saved in
onSaveInstanceState and restored in onCreate in MainActivity.
Added code to handle bug where DialogFragments are dismissed on rotate
when setRetainInstance is set to true.

title: Clean layouts, remove HelperActivity layout
message:
Clean layouts, remove HelperActivity layout

Removed unnecessary layout for HelperActivity. Readded ViewHolder to
TaskAdapter. Removed unused OAuth scope. Changed nav drawer icon and
text color. Removed unused drawables.

title: Clean DialogFragments, fix access level modifiers
message:
Clean DialogFragments, fix access level modifiers

AddTaskDialogFragment and EditTaskDialogFragment. Simplified callback
in DatePickerDialogFragment.

message: Readd code to save date in AddTaskDialogFragment

title: Rework DateFormatter
message:
Rework DateFormatter

DateFormatter is now a singleton. Simplified formatting into three
overloaded methods. Created SimpleDateFormat to correctly handle
RFC 3339 timestamps.

title: Update Tasks API dependency, optimize TaskAdapter
message:
Update Tasks API dependency, optimize TaskAdapter

Updated the Tasks API dependency to rev47-1.22.0. Removed unused and
redundant dependencies. Optimized TaskAdapter.getView()

title: Clean TaskListFragment and DatabaseHelper
message:
Clean TaskListFragment and DatabaseHelper

Optimized TaskListFragment and moved methods for saving and loading
tasks to DatabaseHelper. Added comments to TaskListFragment and
PlusPersonDeserializer. Renamed Task AsyncTask callbacks to fit
convention.

title: Streamline and clean MainActivity
message:
Streamline and clean MainActivity

Removed unused code and set appropriate access level modifiers.
Created Intent for MainActivity to send when signing out. Set
Activitys' launch modes to singleTop. Fixed AccountDialogPreference
key.

title: Fix fullscreen logic for LoginActivity
message:
Fix fullscreen logic for LoginActivity

Device API level is checked in LoginActivity when setting fullscreen
mode. For API >= 19, Immersive Fullscreen Mode is used. Lower API
levels will use flags to explicitly hide the status bar and navigation
bar.

title: Start reworking fullscreen LoginActivity
message: Start reworking fullscreen LoginActivity

unnecessary code. Snackbar is now displayed when login fails/succeeds.

message:
Add helper class for SharedPreferences

Added a helper class to simplify SharedPreferences calls. Added an
Application subclass for global context uses and general helper
methods.
